Examples#

Example 1#

Solving the modes of a GRIN index fiber using the radial solver.

Contents:

  • Graded index fiber using the radial solver
    • 1. Fiber parameters
    • 2. Compute the mode with radial solver
    • 3. Results
    • 4. Save the data

Example 2#

Solving the modes of a step index fiber and comparing the results of the radial solver to the semi-analytical (SI solver) solution of the wave equation, the WKB approximation, and the results of FTD (Comsol) simulations.

Contents:

  • Straight step index fibers
    • 1. Fiber parameters
    • 2. Compute the mode with three different solvers
    • 3. Comparing results

Example 3#

Solving a system with a non-axisymmetrical index profile, a square-core fiber, using the eig2D solver.

Contents:

  • Square fiber using the 2D Eigen-problem solver
    • 1. Fiber parameters
    • 2. Create index profile
    • 3. Using the radial solver
    • 4. Results
